module.name: models_record_types

element.name: TXolmisRecord
element.short: Ancestral Xolmis record model.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.Clear
element.short: Clear the property values.

descr.p: Clear method must be overriden on descendant classes.

element.name: TBandColorCode
element.short: Enumeration of color codes for bird marks.

descr.p: ccNone indicates that there is no bird mark.
ccMetal is the standard aluminum band provided by the Brazilian National Banding System (SNA - Sistema Nacional de Anilhamento). It has an inscription of an unique code.
ccAnotherMetal is another metallic band not provided by the SNA. It is not common in Brazil.
Other options follow the European Color Mark Coding names.

element.name: TBodyPart
element.short: Enumeration of body parts that may have bird marks.

element.name: TMarkType
element.short: Enumeration of bird mark types.

element.name: TBandStatus
element.short: Enumeration of bird mark statuses.

element.name: TBandSource
element.short: Enumeration of bird mark sources or origins.

element.name: TBandEvent
element.short: Enumeration of event types in bird band history.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.Id
element.short: Stores the record primary key value.

descr.p: The field name varies with the descendant type.
Example: method_id for methods table, band_id for bands table, etc.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.Guid
element.short: Stores the record GUID value, if present.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.UserInserted
element.short: Stores the key of the user that created the record.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.UserUpdated
element.short: Stores the key of the user that last modified the record.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.InsertDate
element.short: Stores the timestamp of when the record was created.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.UpdateDate
element.short: Stores the timestamp of when the record was last modified.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.Marked
element.short: Flag indicating that the record is marked or not.
element.descr: This flag is used to filter records.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.Exported
element.short: Flag indicating that the record was exported or not.
element.descr: Currently, this flag is not used.

element.name: TXolmisRecord.Active
element.short: Flag indicating if the record is active or not.

descr.p: A record with Active = False means that the it was deleted and it is now in the "recycle bin".

element.name: TCustomTaxon
element.short: Ancestral taxon record model.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.FullName
element.short: Stores the scientific name of the taxon.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.FormattedName
element.short: Stores the formatted scientific name of the taxon for display purposes.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.Authorship
element.short: Stores the author of the taxon description.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.ParentTaxonId
element.short: Stores the parent taxon key for taxon hierarchy.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.ValidId
element.short: Stores the valid taxon key when the scientific name is a synonym.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.OrderId
element.short: Taxonomic order key for filtering taxa.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.FamilyId
element.short: Taxonomic family key for filtering taxa.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.GenusId
element.short: Taxonomic genus key for filtering taxa.

element.name: TCustomTaxon.SpeciesId
element.short: Taxonomic species key for filtering taxa.

module.short: Library with ancestor data models, including types and constants for descendant models.
